skills.skill: PLC and motion control installation and servicing

duties_responsibilities.duty: Installing, aligning, and servicing lasers, resistance welders, and workstations with PLCs and motion control hardware and software.
Making changes to PLC and motion control programs, and training customers in the use and maintenance of products.
Answering product operation, maintenance, and application inquiries, and writing field visit and customer inquiry reports.
Working with customers and other visitors on in-house application development. Collaborating on application development and maintenance with visitors.

education_certification.credential: 4-year degree in engineering, materials, physics, chemistry or related discipline.
Ability to read, write, and speak Japanese.
Good practical electrical and mechanical troubleshooting knowledge.
Proficient PC computer skills including Microsoft Office products.
Significant travel by air and car (in excess of 75% of the time).
Manufacturing, laser, materials processing and/or resistance welding background or experience.
Experience in maintenance of industrial control equipment; preferred.
Computer programming experience; experience in industrial control equipment preferred.
Experience in customer service or field engineering.
Experience in motion control to include M and G codes; preferred.
Ability to learn and read ladder logic.
Experience in training customers in the use of capital equipment; preferred.
Able to travel domestically and internationally on short notice.
